001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.calculator;
002
003import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
004
005import java.util.Objects;
006
007
008
009public interface BolusCalcCondition {
010    BolusCalcCondition POSITIVE_BG_CORRECTION = new Decision("Adding positive BG correction", "above BG target",
011            new BolusCalcPrompt("Your BG is above target: add correction bolus?", "Correction bolus added", "Correction bolus declined"));
012    BolusCalcCondition NO_POSITIVE_BG_CORRECTION = new NonActionDecision("Not adding positive BG correction", "active IOB is greater than correction bolus while above target");
013    BolusCalcCondition SET_ZERO_INSULIN = new Decision("Setting zero insulin", "negative correction greater than carb amount",
014            new BolusCalcPrompt("Your BG is below target: reduce bolus calculation to zero?", "Bolus set to zero", "Zero bolus declined"));
015    BolusCalcCondition NEGATIVE_BG_CORRECTION = new Decision("Adding negative BG correction", "below BG target",
016            new BolusCalcPrompt("Your BG is below target: reduce bolus calculation?", "Bolus reduced", "Bolus reduction declined"));
017
018    class FailedPrecondition extends Condition implements BolusCalcCondition {
019        public final String reason;
020        FailedPrecondition(String reason) {
021            super(reason);
022            this.reason = reason;
023        }
024
025        FailedPrecondition(String reason, Object was, Object expected) {
026            this(reason + ": was " + was + ", expected " + expected);
027        }
028    }
029
030    class FailedSanityCheck extends Condition implements BolusCalcCondition {
031        public final String reason;
032        FailedSanityCheck(String reason) {
033            super("Sanity check failed: " + reason);
034            this.reason = reason;
035        }
036    }
037
038    class WaitingOnPrecondition extends Condition implements BolusCalcCondition {
039        public final String thing;
040        WaitingOnPrecondition(String thing) {
041            super("Waiting for: " + thing);
042            this.thing = thing;
043        }
044    }
045
046    class Decision extends Condition implements BolusCalcCondition {
047        Decision(String decision) {
048            super(decision);
049        }
050
051        Decision(String decision, String because) {
052            super(decision, because);
053        }
054
055        Decision(String decision, String because, BolusCalcPrompt prompt) {
056            super(decision, because, prompt);
057        }
058    }
059
060
061    class DataDecision extends Decision implements BolusCalcCondition {
062        DataDecision(String decision) {
063            super(decision);
064        }
065
066        DataDecision(String decision, String reason) {
067            super(decision, reason);
068        }
069    }
070
071    class NonActionDecision extends Decision implements BolusCalcCondition {
072        NonActionDecision(String decision, String reason) {
073            super(decision, reason);
074        }
075    }
076
077    class IgnoredDecision extends Decision implements BolusCalcCondition {
078        IgnoredDecision(BolusCalcCondition decision) {
079            super("Ignoring '" + decision.getMsg() + "'", "ignored by user");
080        }
081    }
082
083    class BolusCalcPrompt {
084        private final String promptMessage;
085        private final String whenAcceptedNotice;
086        private final String whenIgnoredNotice;
087        BolusCalcPrompt(String promptMessage, String whenAcceptedNotice, String whenIgnoredNotice) {
088            this.promptMessage = promptMessage;
089            this.whenAcceptedNotice = whenAcceptedNotice;
090            this.whenIgnoredNotice = whenIgnoredNotice;
091        }
092
093        public String getPromptMessage() {
094            return promptMessage;
095        }
096
097        public String getWhenAcceptedNotice() {
098            return whenAcceptedNotice;
099        }
100
101        public String getWhenIgnoredNotice() {
102            return whenIgnoredNotice;
103        }
104
105        @Override
106        public boolean equals(Object o) {
107            if (this == o) return true;
108            if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
109            BolusCalcPrompt that = (BolusCalcPrompt) o;
110            return Objects.equals(promptMessage, that.promptMessage) && Objects.equals(whenAcceptedNotice, that.whenAcceptedNotice) && Objects.equals(whenIgnoredNotice, that.whenIgnoredNotice);
111        }
112
113        @Override
114        public int hashCode() {
115            return Objects.hash(promptMessage, whenAcceptedNotice, whenIgnoredNotice);
116        }
117    }
118
119    class Condition extends Exception {
120        private final String msg;
121        private final String reason;
122        private final BolusCalcPrompt prompt;
123        Condition(String msg) {
124            super(msg);
125            this.msg = msg;
126            this.reason = null;
127            this.prompt = null;
128        }
129
130        Condition(String msg, String reason) {
131            super(msg + " because " + reason);
132            this.msg = msg;
133            this.reason = reason;
134            this.prompt = null;
135        }
136
137        Condition(String msg, String reason, BolusCalcPrompt prompt) {
138            super(msg + " because " + reason);
139            this.msg = msg;
140            this.reason = reason;
141            this.prompt = prompt;
142        }
143
144        @Override
145        public boolean equals(Object o) {
146            if (this == o) return true;
147            if (!(o instanceof Condition)) return false;
148            Condition condition = (Condition) o;
149            return msg.equals(condition.msg);
150        }
151
152        @Override
153        public int hashCode() {
154            return Objects.hash(msg);
155        }
156
157        public String getMsg() {
158            return msg;
159        }
160
161        public @Nullable String getReason() {
162            return reason;
163        }
164
165        public @Nullable BolusCalcPrompt getPrompt() {
166            return prompt;
167        }
168    }
169
170    String getMsg();
171    @Nullable String getReason();
172    @Nullable BolusCalcPrompt getPrompt();
173}
